snippet: This year’s World Nomads Festival will focus on the culture of Tunisia, where artists played a crucial role in overthrowing the country’s authoritarian government in January 2011.
abstract: This year’s World Nomads Festival will focus on the culture of Tunisia, where artists played a crucial role in overthrowing the country’s authoritarian government in January 2011.

headline.main: World Nomads Arts Festival to Focus on Tunisia
headline.print_headline: Arts Festival  To Focus on Tunisia
